case.name: Masturbation play
case.description: Nagisa starts reciting a play while masturbating

trigger.state: Let me tell you a touching story about a girl who lives all alone. Nothing dies, and nothing is born in the world.

case.name: End masturbation play
case.description: Nagisa has finished masturbating, which consisted of reciting lines to a play

trigger.state: Oh! Forget you saw anything today, please? Please, please?

case.name: Random food word
case.description: Nagisa motivates herself to do difficult things by calling out the name of a food that she's promising herself for later. If she does this, she'll set the nagisa_food_motivation marker.

markers.marker: Nagisa and Buffy feel differently about high school.
Nagisa asks Zone-tan if her hand is good. It isn't.
Nagisa mentions leaving but never goes through with it.
This is Nagisa's first final stage line. It does not repeat.
This is Nagisa's second final stage line. It does not repeat.
Nagisa has never played strip poker before this game.
Nagisa canonically promises herself food to motivate her to do difficult things.
Nagisa wears red hairclips not visible from the front. She doesn't think to use them as an extra layer.
Nagisa can say "Oh, is that so?", seemingly replying to a number of contexts. This marker prevents it from happening twice.
Nagisa can tell that Jura is starting the game without a bra.
When introducing herself when Marinette is present, she mentions that her name can be written with one Chinese character (kanji).
When the game starts, Nagisa is alarmed that Kyu's panties are already visible.
Nagisa questions whether she's required to sit with her legs apart after losing.
Nagisa wants a little sister like the innocent female who removed a minor item.
Nagisa reacts differently to Mahiru's camera depending on her state of undress.
Nagisa reacts differently to Mahiru's camera depending on her state of undress.
Nagisa reacts differently to Mahiru's camera depending on her state of undress.
Nagisa reacts differently to Mahiru's camera depending on her state of undress.

Nagisa reacts differently to Mahiru's camera depending on her state of undress.
Nagisa gets along fine without a maid.
Nagisa calls out a meanie.
Meia and her short blue hair remind Nagisa of Tomoya, a boy who is a friend.
Nagisa's father claims that she has a mysterious scar on her butt.
Defeated Nagisa asks Pit if he has a perfect body.
Nagisa claims to have played the Tomoyo After game.
In the first round, Nagisa can announce that she didn't realize that boys would be playing too.
Nagisa has several opportunities to turn around and reveal her backside during the game. This marker allows her opponents to request that she do it again.
Nagisa dares to call Revy the "mean gun lady" while the latter is masturbating.
Nagisa notices that the game is for some reason being played in the middle of the road!
Did Nagisa read Emergence? Surely not.
Nagisa recongizes Sanako's uniform as being from the same school.
Nagisa doesn't know how she got into this mess.
In an episode of Clannad, Nagisa's friends win school sporting games to advertise their friend for Student Council President.
Nagisa modestly claims not to look good in a swimsuit.
Nagisa can make a tentacle comparison when playing with Zone-tan.
Nagisa would make a terrible pirate.
Nagisa thinks Tifa will "win" even if she loses (because of her bust).
Zoey and Nagisa entertain the idea of having an underwear party instead.
Nagisa observes that it would be difficult to play cards while wearing a helmet.
Nagisa has never been to space.
Nagisa mistakes Uravity for an actress.
Will Nagisa's friend Kyou arrive to play too? Answer: no.
Nagisa recommends to Zizou that she remove her amulet next. Zizou does not remove her amulet.
